QAPair.Question: What is (are) AIDS - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on HIV/AIDS : HIVinfo.NIH.gov -- hivinfo.nih.gov/ , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/hiv/default.html , HIV.gov -- www.hiv.gov/ , US Dept of Health and Human Services, Office on Women's Health -- www.womenshealth.gov/hiv-and-aids , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/hivaids.html , World Health Organization -- www.who.int/news-room/fact-sheets/detail/hiv-aids ,
